knimeNode.name: Precision Checker
knimeNode.shortDescription: Based on the replayer result, the node performs the ETConformance analysis.

fullDescription.intro:
ETConformance is a Process Conformance evaluation between an Event Log and a Petri Net. The plug-in returns the values for some metrics (and some other information) and the Minimal Disconformant Traces [MDT] (traces that helps to identify the exact point where the model begins to allow more behavior than the log). In other words, for each trace a1 …an in MDT, a1…an-1 is in the Petri Net and in the Log, but a1...an is only in the Petri Net.
More information seen in the : paper and codes documentation.
fullDescription.option:
The algorithm to calculate the precision. It includes the following algorithms.
1-Align Precision.
All-Align Precision.
Representative-Align Precision.
ETC Precision (no invisible/duplicates allowed).

ports.inPort: Replayed result in alignment as input.
